title: Essential10
author: Essential10
content: As ridiculous as it may sound, the truth is that I want to fulfill a dream of building a house with Bitcoin. My parents took care of me from childhood and they taught me education and they are still trying to teach me education. Father is very old and it is not possible for him to work as he used to, so I myself feel that I should do something. At the moment, if I could somehow earn to help my family or pay for my education, then maybe the pressure on my father would be reduced a lot. I joined Bitcoin to fulfill my dream. My mother has a dream to build a house, maybe in the future I will have to help her fulfill her dream because my father is spending the money he earns on my education and running the family so at the moment he cannot afford to build a house. I have already gained enough knowledge about trading by being involved with Bitcoin, firstly I want to start my Bitcoin journey through trading, after making some money from trading I plan to invest in Bitcoin for four years. These four years I will hold my investment and also save the money earned from trading or signature campaign for four years so that after four years I can start building the house.  You must pray for me so that I can fulfill my mother's dream.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PMAs ridiculous as it may sound, the truth is that I want to fulfill my dream of building a house with Bitcoin. You need bricks and cement to build a house not BTC. Hehe don't mind just kidding. I pray that your wish will be fulfilled very soon. Your plan is good as you have started trading in BTC and also want to hold BTC for longer period of time. You do have a good plan and I pray that you will reach to a rank where you can join the signature campaigns. But till then you can spend your time in learning some other skills, like advancing your existing trading skills or in learning another skills. You are studying, so you have a progressive mind now and you can adapt new things very fast, so don't waste time and learn some skills like developing etc. Skills depend on the relevant education your getting. Don't waste your education so please find a way to use that too. That's why I said find a skill related to your education.But to be honest, it does not matter at all. The thing that matters is, you making money. So at the current time, you might give a try to join bounties because at the most you can earn around $1000 from bounties but in a year. This estimate is based on my personal experience. I was participating in videos and articles campaigns.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PMMy mother has a dream to build a house, maybe in the future I will have to help her fulfill her dream because my father is spending the money he earns on my education and running the family so at the moment he cannot afford to build a house.What happened with the dividends from your successful farm that was earning you enough money to invest in Bitcoin?Quote from: Essential10 on July 10, 2023, 03:39:30 AMAfter few years I kept saving money and with the saved money I started a quail and pigeon farm. After two years of service I got a fairly good benefit from them. ~ A few months ago when the bitcoin market was 17 thousand USD I invested 80% of the dividend in the bitcoin market and I still hold it. Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PMYou must pray for meThat's not how prayers work!But I will pray that next time you get your merit stories right!

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: First of all, your dream is possible with Bitcoin and it is good you are coming with a plan already. That means you will have direction and areas to focus in. It will not come easily but surely, it is achievable if the will and dedication is in place. I wish you good luck. Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PM I have already gained enough knowledge about trading by being involved with Bitcoin, firstly I want to start my Bitcoin journey through trading, after making some money from trading I plan to invest in Bitcoin for four years.To trade Bitcoin, you realise capital will be involved as well as the risk of loosing the capital? Are you prepared for whatever outcome you will experience? I do not mean to scare you but understanding the risk involved will help you in planning and decision making. If you have a cashflow that can support you buying Bitcoin no matter how small, why not apply DCA and run it till the next bull run instead of depending entirely on day trading? After funding your trading account, I am suggesting you start accumulating Bitcoin after making your financial projections. You can start very small and grow with time... in that case you are pursuing it both ways: trading and investment.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: I think your mother would very much love to fulfill your own dream and not hers. But, if you have the same dream then it gets easier. Your father is trying to give you an education so you can provide for yourself, I don't think they want you to be responsible for them if ever the time comes that you get successful in life. I mean, that's how parents are. Now you said you are trading. Are you sure about the path that you are taking? Even though you learned so much about it there are always chances that you might get rekt if the market won't fluctuate the way you like it. There's still risk involved in it and you will need money for your capital which means spending, so where will you get that money?Don't get me wrong I am not bringing you down, it's just that you said you are still a student and I do believe your father can still manage it for your education. If you can save some money by working a little then good, but don't force it and try to finish that education first. It will be the best gift you can give to them.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PMAs ridiculous as it may sound, the truth is that I want to fulfill a dream of building a house with Bitcoin. <snip>You must pray for me so that I can fulfill my mother's dream.It is the dream of your mother to build the house but she never said that build the house with Bitcoin BTC or did she ? Even if you earn enough fiat money and build the house with that money, will she not accept it ? and she would like that you earn bitcoins and build the house with bitcoin  I think you are wrongly portraying it here. Your mother's dream is that you build a house for her and you wish that you start bitcoin trading and gain profit and then build a house.

comments.author: aylabadia05
comments.body: Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PMAs ridiculous as it may sound, the truth is that I want to fulfill a dream of building a house with Bitcoin.   Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PMYou must pray for me so that I can fulfill my mother's dream.It's not ridiculous because I also have a dream of having my own house but the need for housework is expensive. Forced to rent So, pray for me first before I pray for you.If you already have land that is certified in your name as a legally valid form of ownership to build a house, you already have the easement. Just think about how to buy building materials.Building a house requires a lot of money. For those who are not balanced with their monthly income, this will be an obstacle. Try investing in Bitcoin instead of as savings because when the Bitcoin price reaches its highest, you can use the return from the current purchase price to buy building materials.

comments.author: leonair
comments.body: Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PMAs ridiculous as it may sound, the truth is that I want to fulfill a dream of building a house with Bitcoin. My parents took care of me from childhood and they taught me education and they are still trying to teach me education. Father is very old and it is not possible for him to work as he used to, so I myself feel that I should do something. At the moment, if I could somehow earn to help my family or pay for my education, then maybe the pressure on my father would be reduced a lot. I joined Bitcoin to fulfill my dream. My mother has a dream to build a house, maybe in the future I will have to help her fulfill her dream because my father is spending the money he earns on my education and running the family so at the moment he cannot afford to build a house. I have already gained enough knowledge about trading by being involved with Bitcoin, firstly I want to start my Bitcoin journey through trading, after making some money from trading I plan to invest in Bitcoin for four years. These four years I will hold my investment and also save the money earned from trading or signature campaign for four years so that after four years I can start building the house.  I wish you success. But I don't know how you earn bitcoins. and you mentioned that you joined bitcoin to fulfill your dream.  Do you want to profit from Bitcoin through investment? or do you want to trade bitcoins? or fulfill your dream by earning money through bounties or signatures from this forum.If you want to profit by investing or holding bitcoins and fulfill your dream of building a house with this money then you need to invest a large amount in bitcoins like $5k-10k so that the price of bitcoins increases by 2-3x your investment.  In case you will get good returns with which you can build a nice houseIf your aim is to fulfill your dream by earning money through Bitcoin trading.  In that case you need to learn potential training strategies and market analysis to get a better result.If your intention is to earn money from this forum such as from signature campaigns or bounties, then you need a high ranking account to do signature campaigns.  And doing a bounty at this time would be a wrong decision and only a waste of time

comments.author: She shining
comments.body: Biasly, if that's a word I would say HODL than trading. Experience is a ruthless teacher. Except you are trading a coin like Bitcoin and not selling in a loss. Optimistically I believe its achievable but knowledge and capital matters a lot. Bitcoin ain't shitcoins that do 70% rise and 90% fall.

comments.author: Jaycoinz
comments.body: That’s cool friend, you have to work hard and make sure you make use of the three key of investment which are; power of knowledge, the ability of being patient and risk management, so you can be able to achieve what you’re aiming for and that of your mum.Wish you best of luck

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Firstly teaching and education are almost the same thing and you put then together wrongly in your post. Well welcome to the forum and in as much as everyone is entitled to their dreams and the process of how they Are going to achieve that dreams I would say is your sole dream and aspiration only to get a house? You speak off saving for four years and then use it to get. House then what next? The house is not an investment that would be bringing you income. May dream of something more that would guarantee you and your family financial security.Also trading is unpredictable, the fact that you want to enter Bitcoin trading does not mean you would be successful in it, if not everyone would be trading. You don't have the luxury to enough capital in my opinion, I would suggest you start with investing in Bitcoin and then grow your portfolio with that. This are just my thoughts you have the final say .

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PMAs ridiculous as it may sound, the truth is that I want to fulfill a dream of building a house with Bitcoin.What a great idea, for you to have at least conceive this then you can achieve it, but what it may only require from you is time and the perfect knowledge on how to make this a reality, bitcoin can make life changed, also it gives way for everyone who see the importance of what impact it could give in finances.Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PMMy mother has a dream to build a house, maybe in the future I will have to help her fulfill her dream because my father is spending the money he earns on my education and running the family so at the moment he cannot afford to build a house.You're mother will be so proud of you if you actually get this fulfilled, however, try as much as possible to see that you have every necessary and required knowledge about bitcoin, because this is your first stepping stone towards the achievement you planned aheadQuote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PMI have already gained enough knowledge about trading by being involved with Bitcoin, firstly I want to start my Bitcoin journey through trading, after making some money from trading I plan to invest in Bitcoin for four years. These four years I will hold my investment and also save the money earned from trading or signature campaign for four years so that after four years I can start building the house.  Also know that there's a need for you to always stay updated on the informations about bitcoin each day so that you don't get retarded on learning, trading and investment has better opportunities for profitability if you know how to trade and can also hodl your bitcoin investment whenever you buy the dip and hodl.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PM At the moment, if I could somehow earn to help my family or pay for my education, then maybe the pressure on my father would be reduced a lot. I joined Bitcoin to fulfill my dream. Whatever happened to your pigeon and quail farm, is it still running?Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PM I have already gained enough knowledge about trading by being involved with Bitcoin, firstly I want to start my Bitcoin journey through trading, after making some money from trading I plan to invest in Bitcoin for four years. These four years I will hold my investment and also save the money earned from trading or signature campaign for four years so that after four years I can be a start building the house.  . That’s a great goal to have. Though the process to achieving that goal may not be as easy as you think. You would need to acquire and hodl a significant amount of bitcoin and hope after four years the profits realized will be enough to build a house in your country. You say you’ve enough knowledge of trading, I hope you actually do because crypto trading isn’t a joy ride, there are times when the market will go against your expert analysis. My point is the crypto market is very volatile and predictions can fail.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PMYou must pray for me so that I can fulfill my mother's dream.Don't ask for prayers from others because if you can't do it yourself then others prayers won't do it for you. Believe in yourself and continue working hard, if you really want to build that house for your parents then you'll have to give more time to work because without working you won't be able to earn that much money which is needed to build the house. I recommend you to learn a skill and try freelancing as well if you want to speed up the process. There is a lot of money for the ones who master some skills and if you can master a skill like graphic design, photo retouching, video editing, application development, web development, and game development in Unity then it will be much easier for you to get clients and earn some money. You can invest the earned money into Bitcoin by following a DCA strategy and when you earn enough profits from the investment then start building the house.

comments.author: BitcoinPanther
comments.body: @OP I hope all your plan come true, it is good to invest in Bitcoin and trade but I would like to remind you that it is much better if you finish your study and if possible with flying colors.  That would be the best gift for your parents as thank you for getting you to attend school.  Aside from that since you are not that wealthy, it is best if you can establish a career path in order to get your source of income aside from trading and Bitcoin. Trading is not all win, there are times when the market become crazy and unpredictable which may cause you lose your trades, so it is better to have a another source of income.

comments.author: Gaza13
comments.body: It's truly a noble dream for you as a child to make your parents happy, having a house is everyone's dream, including myself too, there are many obstacles to getting it, we can't afford to buy cash with credit at this bank, we will become slaves to the bank, besides that You also have to look for additional information around cryptocurrency airdrops, testnet or social media bounties. If you get a jackpot from the airdrop, set aside to buy Bitcoin then hold it until you want. If your real job is lacking, you have to look for additional work to meet your needs. In essence, if we try hard, the results will never lieFrom your story above, have you mastered the technical trading system? Trading in the market is difficult to predict in its direction. Because prices are very volatile, usually 90% of beginners in trading will lose a lot of money in the first month. advise and avoid,

comments.author: |MINER|
comments.body: First of all many prayers and good wishes for you.  May God grant you the grace to fulfill your mother's wish.  But I want to know how much you know about bitcoin?  I don't think it is ever good to start trading suddenly. Learning trading takes a lot of time.  And you didn't even mention what you want to do. Just said you joined bitcoin to make money. Now what do you really mean you want to trade, investment, or bounty?  Bitcoin is definitely not a money making machine. You need to gain enough knowledge about it first then you can expect profit from it.  Since you are studying then you can improve from here too.  You can build a house even if you are educated and employed.  I would say you should study now and increase knowledge about bitcoin then expect profit from bitcoin.

comments.author: TheYankeesWin!
comments.body: Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PMAs ridiculous as it may sound, the truth is that I want to fulfill a dream of building a house with Bitcoin. My parents took care of me from childhood and they taught me education and they are still trying to teach me education. Father is very old and it is not possible for him to work as he used to, so I myself feel that I should do something. At the moment, if I could somehow earn to help my family or pay for my education, then maybe the pressure on my father would be reduced a lot. I joined Bitcoin to fulfill my dream. My mother has a dream to build a house, maybe in the future I will have to help her fulfill her dream because my father is spending the money he earns on my education and running the family so at the moment he cannot afford to build a house. I have already gained enough knowledge about trading by being involved with Bitcoin, firstly I want to start my Bitcoin journey through trading, after making some money from trading I plan to invest in Bitcoin for four years. These four years I will hold my investment and also save the money earned from trading or signature campaign for four years so that after four years I can start building the house.  You must pray for me so that I can fulfill my mother's dream.Good luck earning the BTC and saving it for your mom's home.

comments.author: darkangel11
comments.body: You want to build a house, but do you even know how to do it? Have you worked in construction, or is hiring people to do the job for you the only plan you have?Do you have a land to build that house on, or is this also a job for bitcoin? All in the hands of God and bitcoin now, I guess Quote from: stompix on October 07, 2023, 04:20:09 PMThat's not how prayers work!But I will pray that next time you get your merit stories right!Pray that he stops making them because only prayers may help in this case. He's successful at earning merit with his made up stories and we all know what this process leads to. Yes, that's right, more made up threads, until he earns enough to apply in a signature campaign.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: Essential10 on October 07, 2023, 04:09:58 PMYou must pray for me so that I can fulfill my mother's dream.You will need a decent job or a business to get that kind of money for your dream house construction. You can’t earn magically using Bitcoin unless you have a decent capital for your Bitcoin investment. The era of earning x100 and above on Bitcoin is already over that gives you possibility to get a money worthy of building a dream house with minimal investment involved. It’s not bad to dream big on Bitcoin but you should know that Bitcoin is an investment and not a money printer so you will still need a hard work and decent income just to have enough money for your dream. Don’t rely too much on Bitcoin for your future but rather invest only what you can afford to lose and focus on your job or something that will give you consistent profit.
